Class ActionFilterRegex

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter.ActionFilter
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter.ActionFilterRegex
public class ActionFilterRegex extends ActionFilter
An action filter that matches text in an action using a regular expression
